footnotes: Na Yeye peke yake ndiye Mwenye kumiliki Siku ya Malipo na Hisabu, yaani Siku ya Kiyama, anafanya atakavyo wala hapana mwenye kushirikiana naye walau kwa kuonekana tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
